title: Trade setup for August 8: Top 15 things to know before the opening bells
description:
Nifty Trade setup for August 8

The Nifty 50 staged a healthy recovery in the last hour of trade on August 7, rebounding from a knee-jerk reaction to the Trump tariff announcement, and closed 22 points higher. The index managed to end the day just above the 100-day EMA (24,595) after recovering 250 ...
